meanings.definition: To live in a mistaken or wrong manner.
meanings.sent1: She mislives by always choosing the wrong path.
meanings.sent2: He often mislives by making hasty decisions.
meanings.sent3: The cat mislives by trying to catch its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The student mislives in a world of procrastination.

meanings.definition: A life lived in error or mistake.
meanings.sent1: His mislives have taught him valuable lessons.
meanings.sent2: The book tells the story of a mislives filled with regrets.
meanings.sent3: The mislives of the character make the story more interesting.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the protagonist's mislives shape the plot.
meanings.sent5: The mislives of the past haunted him.
